job_details.Functieomschrijving:
The role will be focused on backend development. You'll focus on delivering product features, developing backend APIs, data collection and ingestion services.

   The team

   Our tech team is based in Amsterdam, where most of us work 2 days a week onsite. We are a lean team of 10 senior engineers and 4 colleagues in Product and Design. Together we operate efficiently and pragmatically, where everyone's voice is heard. We are rapidly scaling so there's plenty of room to have a big impact and set directions. Apart from a short daily stand-up we keep meetings to a minimum. We do a monthly tech-team social event on Tuesday evenings that you are welcome to join.
job_details.full_text:
Senior Software Engineer (Go)

The role will be focused on backend development. You'll focus on delivering product features, developing backend APIs, data collection and ingestion services.

   The team

   Our tech team is based in Amsterdam, where most of us work 2 days a week onsite. We are a lean team of 10 senior engineers and 4 colleagues in Product and Design. Together we operate efficiently and pragmatically, where everyone's voice is heard. We are rapidly scaling so there's plenty of room to have a big impact and set directions. Apart from a short daily stand-up we keep meetings to a minimum. We do a monthly tech-team social event on Tuesday evenings that you are welcome to join.

profile_classification.rationale: The job description focuses heavily on backend development, API creation, and data ingestion services using Go. While it mentions a lean, pragmatic team and opportunities for impact, it lacks any specific mention of AI, machine learning, generative models, or related technologies and tasks. The core responsibilities described align with traditional software engineering rather than specialized AI roles.

job_tasks.justification: The description explicitly mentions 'backend development', 'delivering product features', and 'developing backend APIs', which are core activities of software development.
The phrase 'developing backend APIs' directly relates to building the interfaces for backend services.
The mention of 'data collection and ingestion services' falls under the umbrella of data engineering, focusing on how data is brought into the system.
The phrase 'operate efficiently and pragmatically' indicates a focus on practical and effective problem-solving.
The statement 'plenty of room to have a big impact and set directions' suggests an environment where individuals can take initiative and ownership.
job_tasks.phrase: plenty of room to have a big impact and set directions

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'everyone's voice is heard' implies a collaborative environment where communication is valued.

soft_skills.phrase: plenty of room to have a big impact and set directions
